00033 GenericBoard::GenericBoard( int board_index, void (* scope_refresh)( int, bool), void (*update_samples_ready_led)( bool), wxMutex *p_data_mutex, AppSettings *p_app_settings): 
00034                                                         ScopeRefresh( scope_refresh), UpdateSamplesReadyLed(update_samples_ready_led), m_p_data_mutex( p_data_mutex), m_p_worker_thread(NULL), 
00035                                                         m_p_app_settings( p_app_settings), m_board_index( board_index)
00036 {
00037         this->m_p_data= NULL;
00038         this->m_is_running= false;
00039         this->m_is_recording= false;
00040         this->m_record_max_buffers= 0;
00041         this->m_record_use_max_buffers= false;
00042 
00043 }

00045 GenericBoard::~GenericBoard( )
00046 {
00047         // Stops the thread
00048         this->DoStopRunning();
00049 
00050         // Delete channel list
00051         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_channel_array.GetCount(); i++)
00052         {
00053                 delete (GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_channel_array[i];
00054         }
00055         this->m_channel_array.Clear();
00056         // Delete virtual channel list
00057         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_virtual_channel_array.GetCount(); i++)
00058         {
00059                 delete (GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_virtual_channel_array[i];
00060         }
00061         this->m_virtual_channel_array.Clear();
00062         
00063 }
00064 bool GenericBoard::LoadConfig( wxConfigBase* p_config, const wxString& base_section)
00065 {
00066         /*
00067                 Application setting board parameters' file structure
00068 
00069               |- ADDRESS= 0xee00                                // Hex board base address
00070           |- NUM_CHANNEL= N                                     
00071           |- NUM_VIRTUAL_CHANNEL= M                                     
00072           |- [0]
00073           |   |- { CHANNEL DATA }
00074                   |   | ...
00075           |- [N-1]
00076           |   |- { CHANNEL DATA }
00077           |- [VIRT_0]
00078           |   |- { VIRTUAL CHANNEL DATA }
00079                   |   | ...
00080           |- [VIRT_(M-1)]
00081           |   |- { VIRTUAL CHANNEL DATA }
00082         */
00083         if( this->m_p_data== NULL) 
00084                 return false;
00085         //
00086         // Get the board address
00087         wxString board_add_string= _("");
00088         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("ADDRESS"), &board_add_string, _("0"));
00089         unsigned long board_add= 0;
00090         wxString hex_part;
00091         if( board_add_string.Upper().StartsWith(_("0X"), &hex_part))
00092         {
00093                 // Hex format
00094                 if( !hex_part.Trim().ToULong( &board_add, 16))
00095                 {
00096                         board_add= 0;
00097                 }
00098         }
00099         else
00100         {
00101                 // Decimal format
00102                 if( !board_add_string.Trim().ToULong( &board_add, 10))
00103                 {
00104                         board_add= 0;
00105                 }
00106         }
00107         this->m_p_data->m_base_address= (UINT16)board_add;
00108 
00109         //
00110         // Get the Channel Number
00111         int channel_number= 0;
00112         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("NUM_CHANNEL"), &channel_number, 0);
00113         for( int i= 0; i< channel_number; i++)
00114         {
00115                 //
00116                 // Get Channel specific parameters
00117                 wxString channel_string= wxString::Format( "%s%i/", base_section.c_str(), i);
00118                 this->m_channel_array.Add( this->CreateChannel( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->m_p_data_mutex));
00119                 //
00120                 // Load channel section
00121                 if( !((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_channel_array[i])->LoadConfig( p_config, channel_string))
00122                         return false;
00123         }
00124         //
00125         // Get the Virtual Channel Number
00126         int virtual_channel_number= 0;
00127         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("NUM_VIRTUAL_CHANNEL"), &virtual_channel_number, 0);
00128         for( int i= 0; i< virtual_channel_number; i++)
00129         {
00130                 //
00131                 // Get Virtual Channel specific parameters
00132                 wxString channel_string= wxString::Format( "%sVIRT_%i/", base_section.c_str(), i);
00133                 this->m_virtual_channel_array.Add( this->CreateVirtualChannel( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->m_p_data_mutex));
00134                 //
00135                 // Load Virtual channel section
00136                 if( !((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_virtual_channel_array[i])->LoadConfig( p_config, channel_string))
00137                         return false;
00138         }
00139 
00140         return true;
00141 
00142 
00143 }
00144 bool GenericBoard::SaveConfig( wxConfigBase* p_config, const wxString& base_section)
00145 {
00146         if( this->m_p_data== NULL)
00147                 return false;
00148         //
00149         // Set the board address
00150         wxString board_add_string= wxString::Format( "0x%04x", this->m_p_data->m_base_address);
00151         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("ADDRESS"), board_add_string))
00152                 return false;
00153 
00154         //
00155         // Set the Channel Number
00156         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("NUM_CHANNEL"), (int)this->m_channel_array.GetCount()))
00157                 return false;
00158         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_channel_array.GetCount(); i++)
00159         {
00160                 //
00161                 // Set Channel specific parameters
00162                 wxString channel_string= wxString::Format( "%s%i/", base_section.c_str(), i);
00163                 //
00164                 // Save channel section
00165                 if( !((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_channel_array[i])->SaveConfig( p_config, channel_string))
00166                         return false;
00167         }
00168 
00169         //
00170         // Set the Virtual Channel Number
00171         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("NUM_VIRTUAL_CHANNEL"), (int)this->m_virtual_channel_array.GetCount()))
00172                 return false;
00173         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_virtual_channel_array.GetCount(); i++)
00174         {
00175                 //
00176                 // Set Virtual Channel specific parameters
00177                 wxString channel_string= wxString::Format( "%sVIRT_%i/", base_section.c_str(), i);
00178                 //
00179                 // Save Virtual channel section
00180                 if( !((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_virtual_channel_array[i])->SaveConfig( p_config, channel_string))
00181                         return false;
00182         }
00183         return true;
00184 }
00185 bool GenericBoard::DoStartRunning( void)
00186 {
00187         if( this->IsRunning())
00188                 return true;
00189 
00190         // Starts the thread
00191         this->m_p_worker_thread= new BoardWorkerThread( this);
00192         switch( this->m_p_worker_thread->Create( ))
00193         {
00194         case wxTHREAD_NO_ERROR:
00195                 break;
00196         default:
00197                 this->DoStopRunning();
00198                 return false;
00199         }
00200 
00201         if( !this->DoStartAcquisition())
00202         {
00203                 this->DoStopRunning();
00204         }
00205 
00206         // this->m_worker_thread->SetPriority( WXTHREAD_MAX_PRIORITY);
00207 
00208         switch( this->m_p_worker_thread->Run( ))
00209         {
00210         case wxTHREAD_NO_ERROR:
00211                 break;
00212         default:
00213                 this->DoStopRunning();
00214                 return false;
00215         }
00216     this->SetRunning( true);
00217         return true;
00218 }
00219 
00220 void GenericBoard::DoStopRunning( void)
00221 {
00222 
00223         if( !this->IsRunning())
00224                 return;
00225 //    this->m_thread_exited= false;
00226 
00227         
00228         this->DoStopAcquisition();
00229 
00230         // Stops the thread
00231         if( this->m_p_worker_thread)
00232         {
00233                 switch( this->m_p_worker_thread->Delete( ))
00234                 {
00235                 case wxTHREAD_NO_ERROR:
00236 /*
00237             while( !this->m_thread_exited)
00238             {
00239                 // HACK insert timeout here !!!
00240             }
00241 */
00242                         break;
00243                 default:
00244                         this->m_p_worker_thread->Kill();
00245                         break;
00246                 }
00247                 this->m_p_worker_thread= NULL;
00248         this->SetRunning( false);
00249         }
00250 }

00252 void GenericBoard::DrawCursor( int scope_index, wxDC &dc)
00253 {
00254         // 
00255         // Loop channels
00256         for( size_t j= 0; j< this->m_channel_array.GetCount(); j++)
00257         {
00258                 GenericBoardChannel *board_channel= ( GenericBoardChannel *)this->m_channel_array[ j];
00259                 board_channel->DrawCursor( scope_index,  dc);
00260         }
00261         // 
00262         // Loop virtual channels
00263         for( size_t j= 0; j< this->m_virtual_channel_array.GetCount(); j++)
00264         {
00265                 GenericBoardChannel *board_channel= ( GenericBoardChannel *)this->m_virtual_channel_array[ j];
00266                 board_channel->DrawCursor( scope_index,  dc);
00267         }
00268 }

00392 bool GenericBoard::ToggleRecordStatus( const wxString &path, const wxString &file_name, const wxString &timestamp, bool start, bool use_max_buffer, int max_buffer)
00393 {
00394         bool ret= true;
00395         //
00396         // Append board id
00397         wxString new_file_name= wxString::Format( "%sB%02d", file_name.c_str(), this->m_board_index);
00398         // 
00399         // Loop channels
00400         for( size_t j= 0; j< this->m_channel_array.GetCount(); j++)
00401         {
00402                 GenericBoardChannel *board_channel= ( GenericBoardChannel *)this->m_channel_array[ j];
00403                 if( !board_channel->ToggleRecordStatus(  path, new_file_name, timestamp, start))
00404                         ret= false;
00405                 board_channel->m_p_record_ch_control->Enable( !start);
00406         }
00407         // 
00408         // Loop Virtual channels
00409         for( size_t j= 0; j< this->m_virtual_channel_array.GetCount(); j++)
00410         {
00411                 GenericBoardChannel *board_channel= ( GenericBoardChannel *)this->m_virtual_channel_array[ j];
00412                 if( !board_channel->ToggleRecordStatus(  path, new_file_name, timestamp, start))
00413                         ret= false;
00414                 board_channel->m_p_record_ch_control->Enable( !start);
00415         }
00416 
00417         this->m_record_max_buffers= max_buffer;
00418         this->m_record_use_max_buffers= use_max_buffer;
00419 
00420         this->m_is_recording= start;
00421 
00422         return ret;
00423 }

00425 bool GenericBoard::IsRunning( void)
00426 {
00427     wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_p_app_settings->m_mutex);
00428     return this->m_is_running;
00429 }

00432 {
00433     wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_p_app_settings->m_mutex);
00434     this->m_is_running= value;
00435 }
00436 GenericBoardChannel* GenericBoard::CreateVirtualChannel( int ch_index, void (* scope_refresh)( int, bool), wxMutex *p_data_mutex)
00437 {
00438         return new VirtualBoardChannel( this, ch_index, this->m_p_data, scope_refresh, p_data_mutex, this->m_p_app_settings);
00439 }

00441 bool GenericBoard::GetPhysicalChannelValue( int ch_index, int sample_index, double &result)
00442 {
00443         result= 0;
00444         if( ch_index>= (int)this->m_channel_array.GetCount())
00445                 return false;
00446         if( sample_index>= (int)((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_channel_array[ ch_index])->GetBufferCount())
00447                 return false;
00448         result= ((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_channel_array[ ch_index])->GetSample( sample_index);
00449         return true;
00450 }
00451 bool GenericBoard::GetPhysicalChannelValueVolt( int ch_index, int sample_index, double &result)
00452 {
00453         result= 0;
00454         if( ch_index>= (int)this->m_channel_array.GetCount())
00455                 return false;
00456         if( sample_index>= (int)((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_channel_array[ ch_index])->GetBufferCount())
00457                 return false;
00458         result= ((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_channel_array[ ch_index])->GetSampleVolt( sample_index);
00459         return true;
00460 }

00462 bool GenericBoard::GetPhysicalChannelBufferCount( int ch_index, UINT32 &result)
00463 {
00464         result= 0;
00465         if( ch_index>= (int)this->m_channel_array.GetCount())
00466                 return false;
00467         result= ((GenericBoardChannel*)this->m_channel_array[ ch_index])->GetBufferCount();
